title: Elo-Boosting in action... SmH
body:
Literally in-game when someone states they're boosting a friend's account in Ranked and it's obvious they're doing better than the players in the ELO, you confront them in all-chat but the enemy team goes, "stfu nobody cares"

LOL really? So Elo-boosting is fine? LMAO. 

I will report of course but shouldn't something stated like that in-game be instantly reviewed upon and manually checked to see if the player is elo-boosting or being boosted?

His stats are literally over 20 kills per game on specific champions and previous season wasn't so hot...

Not to mentioned I am reported for harassing the elo-booster because my team mates wants an easy win... Tf?

replies.body:
> something stated like that in-game be instantly reviewed upon and manually checked to see if the player is elo-boosting or being boosted?

LUL YOU THINK RIOT GIVES A FUCK? THEY ARE A CORPORATION OUT TO MAKE MONEY THEY DON'T GOT TIME FOR THIS PETTY SHIT LUL

>
> LUL YOU THINK RIOT GIVES A FUCK? THEY ARE A CORPORATION OUT TO MAKE MONEY THEY DON'T GOT TIME FOR THIS PETTY SHIT LUL

THEY DO CARE? stop trolling and no, you won't tank me

Why don't you ask to get elo-boosted or have a friend play on your account and find out for us? :) Do it! Since you talk so big! I want to see if you get banned or not for cheating.

Don't wuss out now.

You're not even in a game. lmao keep seeking attention.

Hopefully a Riot Moderator sees your comments and punish you.
Also stop stocking me creep I'm a stranger on the internet, get a life.
Not on this account sorry man I don't reveal my real accounts
Just report them because it will flag the suspicious activity and send it to riot support to have it taken care of ASAP!

I did and wrote down their names in the report! But apparently all 4 of them reported me so... hopefully if the automated system doesn't report or punish me for being "toxic" when I was just stating someone is cheating and replying to them when asked why I am 'game throwing' which I did not at all... 

Lol, still Ranked is such a funny game mode now.

I just played a game where there was a premade and in champion select they stated one of their friend is a 'smurf' who is going to carry the game if I gave up my top role for them in the jungle...

Then in-game when I ask if they were actually a smurf or not because I checked naopgg constantly to see my match and of the players I'm against. He stated he plays only a certain champion pool which I figured since it's ranked yeah it makes sense...

Then when he accidentally slipped and said, "this is a buddy's account I'm playing on" was obvious signs he wasn't smurfing but elo-boosting/cheating...

When I addressed this problem with the enemy team who was getting dominated by this single player and the premade, the enemy team didn't care nor bothered. One even mentioned to "stfu nobody cares"... Really? Take a loss because someone's cheating and you're okay with it? O_O

Literally after that I was flamed for "intentionally game throwing" when I was just playing my lane normally... I was threatened to be reported by the premade... I don't get this no more.

You try to do something good and prevent people from ruining games yet you're flamed, hated and reported for doing so... 

I think Ranked is over for me. I lost my will to rank and try to place higher in rank... It's a joke now.
People in game and even irl just hate persons like u. If this elo booster bothered u, just report him after game and move. Don't act like some SJW in all chat expecting some approval from enemy team.
The end of season skin is apparently zed, so _nothing of value was lost_.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=U5lPgEyr,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-08-31T19:33:36.649+0000)
>
> The end of season skin is apparently zed, so _nothing of value was lost_.

Zed is championship skin. Its not end of season.

They announced Championship Zed (which will be purchasable).

They still haven't stated who will receive the Victorious skin (which is what Gold+ players receive).

Try summitting a ticket to Riot with evidence which is probably the print screen you got when the person admit elo boosting, but don't post the guy's name on forum.

Also, in terms of reports in game, you only ever need 1 to flag the offender to be checked by the system. But since there isn't really an option for reporting elo boosting at the end game report, thus I suggested you summit a ticket.

Also, don't repeatedly post in your own post unless you are replying to someone. You can edit the post to add more stuff in if you need to.

Well that's the thing I fear they won't get punished because the account probably has one report flagged against them.

I tried screen printing in-game but it always comes out as a pit black. I think I might have to download a screen capture/recording program because the screen printing doesn't work.


The only evidence I have to go about was that one report I sent... I know for a fact the enemy team didn't care nor reported as they left instantly afterwards with one of them complaining on how bad their team did.

Which irritates me because it wasn't their fault they were dying to someone who was elo-boosting... Literally he flamed their team for "feeding"...

I was just really annoyed and couldn't be bothered to edit my thing so I quickly replied lol.

Still... this is unjust!

Literally in champion selection the player asked for a role because they're a smurf and only play specific champions on "this" account.

You can argue, "maybe it's just someone's alt account" but why refer it to as, "it's my buddy's account I don't care"...?

Then your team mate flames you because you choose not to partake in cheating? What is this game!?

Playing in Ranked now and when players notice there is an elo-booster/someone who clearly isn't in the elo, they simply don't care, get defensive if you ask people to report? What the actual F is happening with Ranked...
